items.sentence: I'm indeed interested in doing that with you.
Many people buy houses larger than they need.
I'd like to buy an old house and renovate it.
How much does an ounce of gold cost nowadays?
Mary has the most clothes of all her friends.
Mary hopes to rest a lot during her vacation.
Are you sure your haven't forgotten anything?
Soon you'll be speaking French like a native.
I want to exercise my right to remain silent.
Go back the way you came and get out of here.
You're not expecting Tom to do that, are you?
You should've told Tom why he had to do that.
The question is who'll be our next president.
Tom and Mary are spoiled brats if you ask me.
Tom asked for a raise, but he didn't get one.
I've heard that Tom is a pretty good drummer.
Tom promised Mary that he'd never forget her.
Would it be possible for us to do that today?
Are you sure that you want to do it this way?
Tell Tom what time he's supposed to be there.
